title: History Of Metal Gear Solid
description:
Metal Gear Solid is one of the most recognisable franchises in video game history and a beloved stealth franchise that inspired many games in the genre after it. The series has a long and storied history, with each mainline entry serving as the landmark release of a game that is talked about even today. #metalgearsolid #mgs #gamespot
